PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-09912014-09-25,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActAn Act to Implement Conventions for the Avoidance of Double Taxation with respect to Income Tax between Canada and France, Canada and Belgium and Canada and Israel
SubjectCanada - Kingdom of Belgium - Protocol Amending the Convention for the Avoidance of Double Taxation and the Prevention of Fiscal Evasion with respect to Taxes on Income and on Capital ** CONVENTION **
PrecisOrder declaring that the 2014 PROTOCOL which amends the existing Tax convention with BELGIUM, is approved by Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
